refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This manual page documents briefly the &package; command.
&package; runs applications installed using Limba. It will set the application environment, make it find its dependencies, initiate a sandbox and do everything else needed to run the application.

refsect1.title: See Also
refsect1.para: Additional documentation can be found on http://people.freedesktop.org/~mak/limba.
